name: Six Feet Gun-der
description:
An ordinary stroll went haywire as you wake up underground right after witnessing a huge explosion. Given a strange gun that can destroy walls, you must plow through stone and venture deep within the strange caverns beneath New York city.

Controls:

Q - Drop weapon
E - Interact
WASD - Move
Left/Right Mouse buttons  - Fire gun/ Use item

Background music
Crystal Cave (song18)
The Cynic Project pixelsphere.org

Menu music
Path to Lake Land
Alexandr Zhelanov, https://soundcloud.com/alexandr-zhelanov

End credits music
Bossa Nova
Joth, https://opengameart.org/users/joth
